snippet.title: Traffic slows after car and motorbike collide on Coast road
snippet.content: BREAKING: A MAN in his 50s is being treated for a leg injury after a car and motorbike collided in Cooroibah this afternoon. Ambulance crews were called to Coral Fern Dr and McKinnon Dr at 3.11pm and a critical care paramedic is on scene. It's believed the patient, who is also suffering neck and back pain, is the motorbike rider - but this is yet to be confirmed. Traffic updates indicate lanes are blocked and drivers are advised to avoid the area. More to come.
